mpm crawler core¶

Module contents¶

Core repository spider

Summary¶

This module defines the scrapy based repository spider as well as the various operation that are performed on the mod informations.

The module also handles the download process of the mod files through normal and interactive urls.

Submodules¶

  • mpm.spiders package

    • mpm.spiders.modinfo module

  • mpm.loaders

    • mpm.loaders.curseforge

mpm.items¶

Define item models for the scraped items.

The item in the release version will probably be an adapter on the SQLAlchemy Mod model

class mpm.items.ModItem(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: scrapy.item.Item

Define the basic informations for a mod

A mod item defines the model for a mod, this representation is the input to various operations can be performed by the modpack designer.

author = None¶

Mod author(s)

fields = {'mod_license': {}, 'name': {}, 'version': {}, 'author': {}, 'url': {}, 'minecraft_version': {}, 'smp': {}}¶
minecraft_version = None¶

The Mod support these minecraft versions

mod_license = None¶

Mod license terms and modpack policy

name = None¶

Mod name

smp = None¶

The mod supports multiplayer and must be included in the server build

url = None¶

Download URL for the mod

version = None¶

Mod version provided by the download url found

mpm.settings¶

Scrapy settings for the mpm project.

This will probably be replaced by dynamic settings in the mpm main command script.
